website_summaries.verdict: An affordable stainless steel taco holder that can also be used for baking and grilling.
pros: Comes in a 2-pack, each capable of holding 2 to 3 tacos (depending on which side is up)
Safe for both oven and grill use
Works well with soft and hard taco shells
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
cons: Holders are small and don't sit completely level when positioned to hold 3 tacos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was great. Good price and fast shipping. It is small like other reviews stated but I think it is what it should be. I used regular sized corn tortillas and it was perfect. The holder does not cradle the taco because that would suck and my tortilla would be soggy. It stood my tacos up to where it didn’t fall or move. It let the taco be the star. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: N. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality taco stands
customer_reviews.text: Small. Read the listing closely. If you want to lay tortillas over and bake until crunchy, these are too small. (That was my hope.) BUT- If you want to use them for their intended purpose, holding hard-shelled tacos, then they’re perfect! Really sturdy and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: ArtingInMuhPJs

customer_reviews.title: This is ridiculous and small
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and these things are not worth the money. They are to small! When I tried to return this product it almost cost more than the price I bought it. This is outrageous! I wouldn't recommend this product to an enemy. Someone on here say they use them to hold their sponges, well to expensive for that too. I hate I bought this DON'T MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE 😡
customer_reviews.author: Kiekey

customer_reviews.title: Great product to make taco night so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love these holders. Tacos can go from heating in oven to filling them. No more breaking and trying to hold them upright while adding ingredients. I place the stands on a baking sheet for easy removal from oven. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Merton

customer_reviews.title: Great taco holders...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid, perfect size, not too big, not too little.. I put rack in oven on baking pan at 350 for about 5-6 mins, then pulled out and put rack and tortillas on a plate, filled with grated cheese, cooked cut up chicken, guacamole, hot salsa, lettuce... they had a nice crunch. Heating tortillas in oven, no oil, seems healthier. Rack keeps tortillas off pan. I love these little racks (I bought two, both shown in photo).
customer_reviews.author: Blabra

customer_reviews.title: The small ones are small, but they work.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the small wire ones and the larger solid ones. The small ones are really small, but they do hold tortillas. It helps that the tortillas push against each other to hold each other up. The larger solid ones are wonderful. They hold a tortillas no problem. I will continue to use both, probably the smaller ones for crunchy tacos. Be sure to read the sizes in the images.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The rack is hysterically small. You can't use a standard tortilla on it. The thing is dwarfed by a single tortilla. I should have gone to Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Razor Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Makes filling tacos a heck of a lot easier!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for filling tacos and we love that one side is for filling two tacos but flipping them over provides for three tacos. A nice addition to our kitchen "gadgets." Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So happy - kind of a fish taco addict and I swear I made the BEST ones I ever have and was able to stand them up in this contraption. It was great! No mess! Got another one for my son for a stocking stuffer -- great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ra!

customer_reviews.title: Amazer 2-Pack Taco Holder, Taco Stand Stainless Steel Rustproof Taco Rack
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive but wasn't. perfect for a taco plate, no mess ,no tacos broken, really love the size and glad I got the metal style. Great to use with guest on taco night.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Huth

customer_reviews.title: Way too SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: These are so small, they barely hold the small "street taco" shells. My mistake for not reading dimensions. I was hoping to get a rack to bake taco shells in the oven, for a less oily result. I will buy from this seller again though, because they have great customer service and sent me another product free. That product didn't meet my original intention, but it is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: cookin' nut

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I should have paid a little more attention to the dimensions of this product. Maybe I was drawn to the low price of this taco holder. They have only made it out of the box once. They store nicely in the box. I plan on donating them to the next silent auction I come across. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Holds three tacos on one side, two on the other
customer_reviews.text: I like that these taco holders can be used on one side to hold three tacos and two tacos on the other. I also use these for filled pita pickets and other unwieldy food items. I will likely order more in the future for taco or pita gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: ttmadison

customer_reviews.title: Taco Holder
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived yesterday...4 days earlier than expected. I can't wait to use then, although I'm sure they are much better than the holing the taco in your hand annd laying on your plate method I've been using. I see tacos in my very near future.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of these, and they seem to be well made. Several of the horizontal wires did not seem to be well attached, but on further inspection, they actually are, even though the weld/joint seems to be better on one side. I've revised this review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie T.

customer_reviews.title: These are fine for hard shell only
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this product except it doesn’t work well for soft tacos. If you serve hard and soft shell tortillas, look for a rounded bottom. These are fine for hard shell only.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie Collucci

customer_reviews.title: A must have for taco lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these taco holders! They are convenient to use, clean up effortlessly in the dishwasher, and are nice looking to boot. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K. Graff

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use in my airfryer! They fit perfectly but the only down fall is I can only use one at a time so I can only my two taco shells at a time in the airfryer. But if you use them in the over you can use both at once!
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Holds tacos
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Holds two to three tacos at a time. Much easier to load while in a stand than trying to hold open on a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Decent bang for the buck but wish they were a little taller for easier tortilla fit. Can only be used with tiny tortillas.
customer_reviews.author: Pacu

customer_reviews.title: No More Tacos Spills!
customer_reviews.text: These make playing tacos so much easier. However, they are not even when I use them for the side to put 3 tacos. I could bend them equal, but they still wobble. Cheap 2 pack for what I got, so I'm not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Torres

customer_reviews.title: This seems sturdy, but is very small
customer_reviews.text: These people are wonderful to work with!!! These holders were a little bit too small, and they sent me larger ones at no charge!!! You can be sure you are satisfied by ordering from them! Great quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny H.

customer_reviews.title: presentation angle is perfect for generous "stuffings" portions
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my air fryer, and sometimes you want 3 tacos, or maybe just two. Also, presentation angle is perfect for generous "stuffings" portions: meat, lettuce, refried beans, rice, cheese, you name it. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. I put them in the oven on a cookie sheet and heat the taco shells, then I fix them in the holder. They store easily because they fit together--don't take up much room. If you eat lots of tacos, these are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Great Tacos
customer_reviews.text: Great for taco nights! No more bending of the shells when in the oven! Also easy to make tacos in!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S

customer_reviews.title: helps hold  tacos UP
customer_reviews.text: these have been really helpful I thought "silly" but .. no finally LOL tacos not hitting the plate and falling apart easy to use, can hold 2 or 3 tacos, and come in a set of 2
customer_reviews.author: M D Mazins

customer_reviews.title: Taco Night A Success
customer_reviews.text: Good product. They only bad thing I would say is that it doesn’t balance very well on certain plates. It has to be completely flat or else it becomes wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These taco holders are perfect. Super easy to clean. I just threw them in the dishwasher. I like that they hold 2 or 3 tacos depending on which way you set them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Much studier that I thought they would be and very cute when serving tacos.
customer_reviews.author: Witchystitcher

customer_reviews.title: #rd time through the dishwasher with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Oh these are just the handiest little things. So far no problems with running them in the dishwasher. Definitely make Taco Tuesday feel way more professional at home.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Small, not good for soft tacos
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than expected. Cannot hold a full soft tortilla very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat these
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of holding my tacos by hand, or relying on the shells to stack and hold other tacos up and spilling everything. Super easy to clean. Reminds me of stainless steel everything that most industrial kitchens have.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: No rust!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Holds up my tacos and doesn't rust. I throw them in the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Stafford

customer_reviews.title: No soft feet!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised to find these racks didn't have the soft feet on them to prevent sliding and scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for hard tacos but too small for soft shell.
customer_reviews.author: Flyin FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: I have used these racks yet so really cannot say if they are easy to clean or not. I was, however, very surprised at how small they are. I was expecting three times bigger than this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Game changer :D
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I eat tacos/fajitas at least once a month and this definitely helps keep things less messy, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. I guess I should have more closely read the dimensions. This won’t hold a soft taco shell. Maybe a small fajita size tortilla. Also the feet are sharp. I won’t use it as I’m worried it will scratch our plates.
customer_reviews.author: Plekky

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, holds small and large taco shells very well. I have finally found a taco shell stand I am very pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean and store.
customer_reviews.text: Great that you can flip from 2 holdere up to 3 up.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the oven or air-fryer
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Easy to clean, and works well to hold taco shells for cooking in the oven or air-fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love these stands. I cook tacos right in my air fryers with these they come out crunchy without the oil
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for hard and soft tacos!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the simplicity of the taco holders. They aren’t an awkward size, easy and light to store in the cabinet. We have used them every time we’ve had tacos since.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great metal taco holders
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Although cannot be used in a microwave, they can be used in an oven. Used it several times and works great
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: They work great in airfryer oven and even to serve them we love them
customer_reviews.author: zachary lampitok

customer_reviews.title: Taco building stands
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for building taco's, there is no mess and you don't waste a lot of the fixins
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Hungerman

customer_reviews.title: quick service, product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just got the taco holders. They were shipped quickly as promised and so far I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Jean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than they look!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Seen these at a restaurant and had to have them!
customer_reviews.author: swilmoth86

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I found a recipe for "peanut butter and jelly tacos" and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I got along without it.
customer_reviews.text: One of those gimmick items that once you get you wonder how you got along before! We make soft tacos all the time, and they would flop on the plate, were hard to put together and were just messy. These take all the mess out of making and serving!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi301

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hard Taco's!
customer_reviews.text: These good for hard Taco shells but I prefer Soft Taco's. They don't work so well with soft one's.
customer_reviews.author: Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for console controller holders and they work great! I’m sure they’re good with tacos too 😆
customer_reviews.author: Vader’s Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Small taco holders
customer_reviews.text: Item was much smaller than exspected but they do work
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Klaric

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: It is way too small. Good idea, but so little.
customer_reviews.author: Karman Vega

customer_reviews.title: great taco stands
customer_reviews.text: these taco stands let me fry the tortilla and by placing it in the taco stand to let it cool, it makes the tortilla take the standard taco shape. Then I can fill and serve using the stands! So convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company sent me a new bigger taco holder free of charge and it is perfect size! Great customer service too. Very happy with my new product!!! Look for the bigger taco holder from this company if purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa_xox

customer_reviews.title: Taco’s made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!!!!! My Husband has MS and has a hard time holding the taco. This has made it much easier. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The holders were sturdy enough - I just wish they had been larger
customer_reviews.text: The holders were sturdy enough - I just wish they had been larger. They easily hold the smallest size of tortilla but not the medium size we normally use.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: The best product I never knew that I needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!!! I just got it in the mail today and guess what I’m having for dinner?! The only thing that was weird, and it really made me giggle, is that the word “holder” on the box is misspelled. (Sorry, I’m a bit OCD and a grammar freak). So excited about my new taco HOLDER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what we were looking for. Had seen something similar on a cooking show. Ours have been washed and are waiting to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Brads

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Makes tacos so much easier Fall over anymore on the sheet pan in the oven

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works but are a bit small. Only good for small tacos.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cooking in the oven and serving right from there I love them

customer_reviews.title: They're sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these taco holders. They're sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: tfletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and attractive. Does the job like a charm. Happy family with no spilled tacos. Ole!
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: So nice not having my shells fall over while I tried to fill them
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pisors

customer_reviews.title: Taco game changer
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet so functional; product is as described. Easy to use, easy to clean - this is the product I had been searching for. This taco rack makes it so much easier to fill and serve the shells. Stackable design convenient for storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: JAMSP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are going to make taco night so much fun
customer_reviews.author: debbie chipman

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you’re s taco lover
customer_reviews.text: My tacos stayed upright and didn’t tip over . Fits on a dinner plate . Genius

customer_reviews.title: Taco Holders
customer_reviews.text: These have been out of stock for so long I'm excited to use them. Very sturdy & love all my tacos stay together!! Easy cleanup too!!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Cox Wallin

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that you can cook and serve both
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found these a long time ago. I like the fact that you can cook and serve both. Easy to clean in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda P.

customer_reviews.title: Small tortilla holder
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I would like. Otherwise they work for small tortillas.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!
customer_reviews.text: These guys are great. We had two and loved them. We ordered two more Incase we had company on taco night. A very good purchase!!

customer_reviews.title: Great for taco lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect and what I needed. Holds my tacos in place so I can enjoy them more.
customer_reviews.author: Cuteyvj83

customer_reviews.title: Love this taco holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this taco holder. It's perfect for my Taco Tuesday nights. Either soft or hard shells stays on there perfectly for me to make the tacos and stays on when you put it down between your bites. I highly recommend it to those who love to eat tacos or other food that needs to be standing up while prepping food and/or during consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Freeeza1

customer_reviews.title: Do you make tacos? You need these!
customer_reviews.text: Had this served to me at a restaurant. Came home and bought. Any body who makes tacos, you need these. So convenient
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: I really like how easy taco night is now that I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how easy taco night is now that I use these taco stands. Keeps tacos together and allows me to prepare several at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Oldenburg

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a taco party I had. There were 10 people attending and I set up a Taco Bar with loads of goodies. These holders made loading their tacos up, 3 at a time, a breeze! I'm very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Iverson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent piece of equipment that makes taco eating an enjoyment.

customer_reviews.title: Great to serve tacos.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product that allows us to serve a taco straight up without any spillage of toppings. Also very convenient while preparing tacos that are loaded with toppings. Children love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does the job!! My tacos no longer fall all over the plate!

customer_reviews.title: We love tacos and eat them often
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and I. We love tacos and eat them often. This product is perfect for 2 or 3 tacos and washes great!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for taco nights. I use it the way it is designed for two tacos, but my husband flips his upside down to hold three tacos and it works great!

customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. We don't even use them because they are too small

product_meta.title: Amazer 2-Pack Taco Holder, Taco Stand Stainless Steel Rustproof Taco Rack Hold 2 or 3 Hard or Soft Taco Shells Taco Truck Tray Style Oven Safe for Baking
feature_bullets: ★ NO MORE TACOS FALLING ON THE FLOOR: Easy to fill and stand tacos, tacos fit perfectly and stand up won’t fall over even when it’s only half a taco, so you don’t have to hold the taco until its finished you can rest it down
★ MAKE TACO NIGHT LESS CLUTTERED: Stainless steel taco stand holds 2 tacos each and easily flip over for 3 slots. Perfect for holding soft shell, hard shell, burritos, sandwiches and more
★ THE OVEN, DISHWASHER SAFE: Amazer taco holder works good for heating taco shells. The taco shells are light and crispy when they come out of the oven. Enhances the flavor of our tacos

★ HIGH QUALITY DESIGN: 100% food-safe Stainless Steel taco holder. Practical, simple, easy to clean. The Taco Stand holders are perfect for any dish, dining table and party. You can put the stand in the oven to keep the tacos warm.
★ EASY to CLEAN: Made of high quality food-safe stainless steel, it is no rust no dim in long-term use, very easy to clean.
